de.htw.berlin.steganography.steganography.image.overlays

Class NoTransparencyShuffleOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.htw.berlin.steganography.steganography.image.overlays.SequenceOverlay
      • de.htw.berlin.steganography.steganography.image.overlays.ShuffleOverlay
        • de.htw.berlin.steganography.steganography.image.overlays.NoTransparencyShuffleOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PixelCoordinateOverlay

    public class NoTransparencyShuffleOverlay
extends ShuffleOverlay
    This class returns Pixels of the underlying Bitmap in a random order determined by the seed that is given to its constructor. It will only return Pixels with an alpha value of 255.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NoTransparencyShuffleOverlay

        public NoTransparencyShuffleOverlay(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                    long seed)
                             throws UnsupportedImageTypeException

        Creates an Overlay that returns Pixels of the underlying Bitmap in a random order determined by the seed that is given to its constructor.

        It will only return Pixels with an alpha value of 255.

        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap to represent the pixels of
        seed - Long to be used to affect the randomization of pixelorder.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedImageTypeException - if the images type is not supported by this overlay

    • Method Detail

      • initOverlay

        protected void initOverlay()
        Description copied from class: ShuffleOverlay

        Initialization of the overlay. This process is separate from the randomization of the overlay.

        Overrides:
        initOverlay in class ShuffleOverlay
